snippet: Conducting a scavenger hunt through The New York Times to find information about the outcome and implications of the caucus voting.
abstract: Conducting a scavenger hunt through The New York Times to find information about the outcome and implications of the caucus voting.

byline.original: By SARAH KAVANAGH and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

lead_paragraph: Overview | What are the Iowa caucuses? What role do they play in shaping American presidential elections? In this lesson, students create sketches and analyze visualizations of the Iowa caucuses, then conduct a scavenger hunt through The Times to find information about the 2012 Iowa caucuses and what they mean for the Republican presidential nomination.

headline.main: First Contest of the Year: Following the Iowa Caucuses
